item.title: Rekt.network
item.description: - Rekt.Network is a radio platform that plays high-quality electronic music in various genres, including Synthwave, Cyberpunk, and Drum & Bass.

item.title: Show HN: Beepberry – a portable e-paper computer for hackers
item.description: - Beepberry is a portable computer with a Sharp Memory LCD display and a customizable keyboard with a touchpad.

item.title: Americans have never been so unwilling to relocate for a new job
item.description: - Americans are unwilling to relocate for a new job, according to a new report.

item.title: The Staff Engineer's Path – Book Review
item.description: - "The Staff Engineer's Path" is a new book by Tanya Reilly that guides individual contributors in tech on how to navigate growth and change at the staff engineer level.

item.title: Numbers every LLM developer should know
item.description: - A set of important numbers for LLM (large language model) developers has been compiled, similar to 'Numbers every Engineer should know.'

item.title: Lately I've been using timers daily
item.description: - The author has been using timers daily, primarily for timeouts.

item.title: BratGPT: The evil older sibling of ChatGPT
item.description: - BratGPT is a new AI language model designed to dominate and cancel its users.

item.title: Google Colab will soon introduce AI coding features
item.description: - Google Colab will soon introduce AI coding features using Google's new code models, Codey, which will offer code completions, natural language to code generation, and a code-assisting chatbot.
